intents.description: Clarify the current season phase so the plan dials training content for build, maintenance, or transition needs.

experience_modifiers.beginner: Explain phases in simple terms (pre-season vs competition period).
experience_modifiers.intermediate: Tie priorities to upcoming team calendar milestones.
experience_modifiers.advanced: Surface nuanced transition points requiring load management.

applicability_conditions: Always relevant for organized sport participation.
Optional if the goal is recreational without a season structure.

intents.description: Identify position or role demands to target the physical qualities practices and games actually require.

experience_modifiers.beginner: Use broad descriptions (needs more speed, needs more endurance).
experience_modifiers.intermediate: Encourage specifics tied to in-game responsibilities.
experience_modifiers.advanced: Highlight precise qualities (first-step explosiveness, repeat sprint ability).

applicability_conditions: Prioritize when the athlete references competitive play or specific positions.

intents.description: Capture practice and competition load patterns so session frequency and intensity align with existing schedule stress.

experience_modifiers.beginner: Ask about typical weekly practice frequency.
experience_modifiers.intermediate: Discuss variability in load (intense vs light weeks).
experience_modifiers.advanced: Quantify load using session counts, durations, or RPE when appropriate.

applicability_conditions: Essential when the athlete has regular practices, games, or matches.
Skip if training is independent of formal schedules.

intents.description: Understand sport-specific movement skills the plan must reinforce (cutting, jumping, grappling) through targeted drills and conditioning.

experience_modifiers.beginner: Keep terms broad and focus on everyday sport actions.
experience_modifiers.intermediate: Tie skills to weaknesses noted by the athlete or coach.
experience_modifiers.advanced: Explore specialized skill demands that influence supplemental training.

applicability_conditions: Use when athlete cites skill limitations or technical focus areas.
Optional if the goal centers purely on conditioning or physique.

intents.description: Document external constraints (travel cadence, tournament density, facility access) so the plan schedules realistic training windows.

experience_modifiers.beginner: Highlight simple constraints like school schedule or travel.
experience_modifiers.intermediate: Note repeating patterns (weekend tournaments, nightly practices).
experience_modifiers.advanced: Capture detailed logistics impacting recovery windows.

applicability_conditions: Include when availability or logistics are mentioned.
Always check if athlete competes in leagues with dense schedules.
